name: Cube Wave (itch) (Dempa)
description:
Cube Wave is 2-Player Game where you battle each other to come out on top! This is a 2D casual game set in a 80s neon retro setting. You win by landing on the other player's head and by keeping your head safe!

There are also 3 different powerups available which randomly grants you either a dash, double jump or smash.
